div.bibl: Skandinaven (Daily Edition), Dec. 19, 1900. [BOOK PEVIEW BY H. P. B.]

body.p: Reverend C. P. Peterson, Bibelske Betragtninger [Bible Studies] (Chicago: Norwegian-Danish Publishing Company, 1900). This book is the result of a fifty-year study of the Bible.
Bibelske Betragtninger should be found in every Christian home....It contains 331 pages and is printed on fine paper. The language is plain and easily understood.
